analysis.description:

TokenVault.claim (/unique_chucks/42/0xa6b123fcdc975a2d708c29522d15ae84e9ec24e2.sol#604-623) uses a dangerous strict equality:

TokenVault.getState (/unique_chucks/42/0xa6b123fcdc975a2d708c29522d15ae84e9ec24e2.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:

Recoverable.recoverTokens (/unique_chucks/42/0xa6b123fcdc975a2d708c29522d15ae84e9ec24e2.sol#82-86) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,tokensToBeReturned(token)) (/unique_chucks/42/0xa6b123fcdc975a2d708c29522d15ae84e9ec24e2.sol#85-86)

TokenVault.recoverFailedLock (/unique_chucks/42/0xa6b123fcdc975a2d708c29522d15ae84e9ec24e2.sol#545-548) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,token.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/42/0xa6b123fcdc975a2d708c29522d15ae84e9ec24e2.sol#548)

TokenVault.claim (/unique_chucks/42/0xa6b123fcdc975a2d708c29522d15ae84e9ec24e2.sol#604-623) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(investor,amount) (/unique_chucks/42/0xa6b123fcdc975a2d708c29522d15ae84e9ec24e2.sol#620-621)
